description: BTCPay Server is a free, open-source, self-hosted Bitcoin payment processor that enables merchants to accept Bitcoin payments without intermediaries.

tools.name: BTCPAY_SERVER_CREATE_PAYMENT_REQUEST
tools.description: Tool to create a new payment request for a store. Use after confirming store ID.

inputSchema.title: CreatePaymentRequestRequest

storeId.title: Store Id
storeId.description: BTCPay Server store ID where the payment request will be created

metadata.title: Metadata
metadata.description: Arbitrary metadata to attach to this payment request

redirectUrl.title: Redirect Url
redirectUrl.description: URL to redirect the customer after payment

customAmount.title: Custom Amount
customAmount.description: Allow customer to enter a custom amount

inputSchema.description: Input schema for creating a BTCPay Server payment request.

tools.name: BTCPAY_SERVER_CREATE_STORE
tools.description: Tool to create a new store in BTCPay Server. Use when you need to provision a new store before processing transactions.

inputSchema.title: CreateStoreRequest

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of the store to be created.

website.title: Website
website.description: Optional: The public website URL of the store.

defaultCurrency.title: Default Currency
defaultCurrency.description: Optional: ISO currency code (e.g., 'USD', 'BTC') to use as default for invoices.

inputSchema.description: Request parameters for creating a new store in BTCPay Server.

tools.name: BTCPAY_SERVER_CREATE_USER
tools.description: Tool to create a new BTCPay Server user. Use when you need to register a new user programmatically as an administrator.

email.title: Email
email.description: The email address of the new user

password.title: Password
password.description: Password for the new user, minimum 8 characters

isAdministrator.title: Is Administrator
isAdministrator.description: Indicates if the new user should have administrative privileges. Defaults to false

tools.name: BTCPAY_SERVER_CREATE_WEBHOOK
tools.description: Tool to register a new webhook. Use when you need to receive store event notifications.

url.title: Url
url.description: The callback URL to receive webhook POST payloads

secret.title: Secret
secret.description: HMAC secret used to sign webhook deliveries. If omitted, the server generates one.

storeId.title: Store Id
storeId.description: The identifier of the store to register the webhook for

authorizedEvents.title: Authorized Events

everything.title: Everything
everything.description: Subscribe to all events if true

specificEvents.title: Specific Events
specificEvents.description: List of specific event types to receive. Required if everything is false.

authorizedEvents.description: Events to subscribe to via this webhook

tools.name: BTCPAY_SERVER_DELETE_API_KEY
tools.description: Tool to revoke a specific API key. Use when you need to remove an API key to immediately prevent its use. Call after identifying the key to revoke.

inputSchema.title: DeleteApiKeyRequest

apikey.title: Apikey
apikey.description: The API key string to revoke. Must match an existing API key for the authenticated user.

inputSchema.description: Path parameter for deleting (revoking) an API key.

tools.name: BTCPAY_SERVER_DELETE_PAYMENT_REQUEST
tools.description: Tool to delete a specific payment request. Use when you need to archive/remove an existing payment request for a store.

paymentRequestId.title: Payment Request Id
paymentRequestId.description: ID of the payment request to delete

tools.name: BTCPAY_SERVER_DELETE_PAYOUT
tools.description: Tool to delete a specific payout from a store. Use when you need to cancel a payout no longer needed.

inputSchema.title: DeletePayoutRequest

storeId.title: Store Id
storeId.description: ID of the store containing the payout

payoutId.title: Payout Id
payoutId.description: ID of the payout to delete

inputSchema.description: Request model for deleting a payout from a store.

tools.name: BTCPAY_SERVER_GET_API_KEY
tools.description: Tool to retrieve the current API key. Use after authentication to get API key details.

inputSchema.title: GetApiKeyRequest
inputSchema.description: No parameters required to retrieve current API key.

tools.name: BTCPAY_SERVER_GET_API_KEYS
tools.description: Tool to list API keys. Use when you need to retrieve all API keys associated with the authenticated user.

inputSchema.title: GetApiKeysRequest
inputSchema.description: Empty request. No parameters needed to list API keys.

tools.name: BTCPAY_SERVER_GET_PAYMENT_REQUESTS
tools.description: Tool to list all payment requests for a specific store. Use after confirming you have the store ID.

inputSchema.title: GetPaymentRequestsRequest

store_id.title: Store Id
store_id.description: Identifier of the store whose payment requests will be listed.

inputSchema.description: Request parameters for listing all payment requests of a specific store.

tools.name: BTCPAY_SERVER_GET_SERVER_INFO
tools.description: Tool to retrieve information about the BTCPay Server instance. Use when needing server version, tor address, supported payment methods, and synchronization states.

inputSchema.title: GetServerInfoRequest
inputSchema.description: No parameters required to retrieve server information

tools.name: BTCPAY_SERVER_GET_STORE
tools.description: Tool to retrieve information about a specific store. Use when you need full store configuration.

inputSchema.title: GetStoreRequest

store_id.title: Store Id
store_id.description: The identifier of the store to retrieve information for.

inputSchema.description: Request parameters for retrieving a specific store by its ID.

tools.name: BTCPAY_SERVER_GET_USER
tools.description: Tool to retrieve information about a specific user. Use when you need to fetch profile data for a given user ID or email.

id_or_email.title: Id Or Email
id_or_email.description: The ID or email of the user to retrieve

tools.name: BTCPAY_SERVER_GET_WEBHOOK
tools.description: Tool to retrieve details of a specific webhook. Use when you need to verify the configuration or status of a webhook for a given store after its creation.

inputSchema.title: GetWebhookRequest

storeId.title: Store Id
storeId.description: Identifier of the store containing the webhook

webhookId.title: Webhook Id
webhookId.description: Identifier of the webhook to retrieve

inputSchema.description: Request schema to retrieve a specific webhook for a store.

tools.name: BTCPAY_SERVER_GET_WEBHOOKS
tools.description: Tool to list all webhooks registered for a store. Use when you need to retrieve the configured webhooks for management or auditing.

inputSchema.title: GetWebhooksRequest

storeId.title: Store Id
storeId.description: Identifier of the store to fetch webhooks for

inputSchema.description: Request schema for listing webhooks of a specific store.

tools.name: BTCPAY_SERVER_LIST_APPS
tools.description: Tool to list all apps associated with a specific store. Use when retrieving basic metadata of every app in that store.

inputSchema.title: ListAppsRequest

storeId.title: Store Id
storeId.description: The identifier of the store to list apps for.

inputSchema.description: Request parameters for listing basic app data for a given store.

tools.name: BTCPAY_SERVER_UPDATE_USER
tools.description: Tool to update current user information. Use when you need to modify your authenticated user profile on BTCPay Server.

inputSchema.title: UpdateUserRequest

name.title: Name
name.description: New display name for the user

email.title: Email
email.description: New email address for the user

imageUrl.title: Image Url
imageUrl.description: New profile picture URL for the user

newPassword.title: New Password
newPassword.description: New password for the user (min length 8)

inputSchema.description: Request model for updating current user profile. All fields are optional; include only those to change.
